ComicInfo.Summary:
How My Family Encouraged Me to Become an Artist!: Dori's trials as an artist
Coping With the "I'm Not Good Enough" Syndrome: Mary rags on her mirror
Moo Goo Gai Pan: Aline's family love to eat, but hate to cook.
Footsy: How Crumb played footsie with girls in his class.
The "Cockeyed" Cook Story: William Cook's life of crime.
The Young and the Frustrated: Vera goes to score
Un-covered Property: A Short Study in Family Dynamics: The pre-pubescent Carol doesn't understand why she can't go topless
The Captain Becomes Critic: The Captain rants about stories concerning artists searching for a muse
TV Evangelist: Dougan's grandmother is fleeced of her possessions by an unscrupulous preacher
I Had a Dream Last Nite: Aline relates an odd dream
The Weirdo Difference!: A strip to sell back issues of Weirdo
